thread.title: Search for man after AOS callout near Balclutha
thread.title_full: Search for man after AOS callout near Balclutha

author: Hannah McLeod
title: Search for man after AOS callout near Balclutha
text:
Search for man after AOS callout near Balclutha HANNAH MCLEOD Last updated 12:19, February 23 2017 BEVAN READ/FAIRFAX NZ 
The armed offenders squad was called to an incident at a Hillend address about 5am Thursday. 
Police are searching for a man after an armed offenders squad callout in Hillend, north of Balclutha. 
A police media spokeswoman said police, including armed offenders squad members, were called to an address in Hillend about 5am Thursday after reports someone, thought to have firearms, was threatening two women. 
"No-one has been injured and no shots have been fired. Police have spoken to the two women involved and one man is currently helping police with inquiries." 
However, the spokeswoman said further inquiries were underway to locate another man in relation to the incident. 
"Police have strong lines of inquiry to follow," she said.
